xdi2.core.features.signatures

Class Signature

  • java.lang.Object
    • xdi2.core.features.signatures.Signature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<Signature>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AESSignature, EC25519Signature, RSASignature

    public abstract class Signature
extends Object
implements Serializable, Comparable<Signature>
    An XDI signature, represented as an XDI attribute.
    Author:
    markus
